name: MOUNTAIN
summary:
~ you are mountain - you are god ~

Ambient procedural mountain game, as seen on The Internet.
FEATURES

- no controls- automatic save
- audio on/off switch
- time moves forward
- things grow and things die
- nature expresses itself
info:
• 中文名: 山
  • 平台: PC/Mac
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014/07/01
  • 售价: $0.99
  • 官方网站: http://mountain-game.com/
